text:
Astrid North (born Astrid Karina North Radmann; 24 August 1973 – 25 June 2019) was a German soul singer and songwriter. She was the singer of the German band. She released five albums with them. She was also a guest singer of the band for which she published three albums. North was born in Berlin.
North died on 25 June 2019 from pancreatic cancer in Berlin, aged 45.
